data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii Yedutun nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ma: «Nà daazu ma kpɛ ga sìɛ ʋeleiti,
Gè ɓɔɠɔ lɔɔni maaɠɛkpɔ golai zu,
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà-eteai ɠaaɓelagi lɛ ga ze,
Wɛlɛ, nà-foloiti kwɛteʋeʋɛ, ta ga zeelo gilagi liegɔi.
Ungo, nui ɠa ziɛzu eɠɛ niinigi,
«Niizu, Màliɠii, leeni ɠa nà ɠito ba niina?
Ùnmɔɔ, è kùla nà-tɔ koloɠologi kpein su!
Nà maaɠɛsu kpɔ, gè la laalaosu,
Ni a kɛ è nuiti maaɠolo, ɗa ti loɠazu ta-vaaɠaaza golaiti faa zu,
«Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, woilo nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ma,
Ɠaazu lati, è seɠe bà, ga gè undaanɛɛ zɔlɔɔ,
